CTR.Q: What type of chart is this?

VEC.Q: How many stages are there in this funnel chart?

SRP.Q: Is the Diagnosis Confirmed stage positioned above or below the Initial Consultation stage?
SRP.A: The Diagnosis Confirmed stage is positioned {below} the Initial Consultation stage.

VPR.Q: What pattern does the data reduction follow in this funnel chart?
VPR.A: The data reduction follows a {exponential} pattern.

VE.Q: What is the value of stage Diagnostic Testing?
VE.A: The value of stage Diagnostic Testing is {3007}.

VE.Q: What is the value of stage Treatment Initiated?
VE.A: The value of stage Treatment Initiated is {932}.

VE.Q: What is the value of stage Initial Consultation?
VE.A: The value of stage Initial Consultation is {4458}.

EVJ.Q: What is the maximum value in the funnel chart?
EVJ.A: The stage with the highest value is Initial Consultation, with a value of {4458}.

EVJ.Q: What is the minimum value in the funnel chart?
EVJ.A: The stage with the lowest value is Treatment Initiated, with a value of {932}.

SC.Q: How much did it decrease from stage Diagnostic Testing to stage Diagnosis Confirmed?
SC.A: Decreased by {1064} Patients from stage Diagnostic Testing to stage Diagnosis Confirmed.

NF.Q: In which stages of the funnel chart does the value exceed 1499? Please list the stage labels and corresponding values.
NF.A: The {Initial Consultation} stage has {4458}, the {Diagnostic Testing} stage has {3007}, the {Diagnosis Confirmed} stage has {1943}.

NF.Q: In which stages of the funnel chart does the value fall below 994? Please list the stage labels and corresponding values.
In which stages of the funnel chart does the value fall between 994 and 2475? Please list the stage labels and corresponding values.
NF.A: The {Diagnosis Confirmed} stage has {1943}, the {Treatment Recommended} stage has {1056}.

NC.Q: Which reduction is greater: from stage Treatment Recommended to Treatment Initiated, or from stage Diagnostic Testing to Diagnosis Confirmed?
NC.A: The reduction from stage {Diagnostic Testing} to {Diagnosis Confirmed} is greater.

NC.Q: Which reduction is greater: from stage Initial Consultation to Diagnostic Testing, or from stage Diagnosis Confirmed to Treatment Recommended?
NC.A: The reduction from stage {Initial Consultation} to {Diagnostic Testing} is greater.

NC.Q: Which reduction is the greatest: from stage Treatment Recommended to Treatment Initiated, from stage Initial Consultation to Diagnostic Testing, or from stage Diagnosis Confirmed to Treatment Recommended?
NC.A: The reduction from stage {Initial Consultation} to stage {Diagnostic Testing} is the greatest.

MSR.Q: Between which two consecutive stages in the funnel chart is the conversion rate drop the largest?
MSR.A: The largest drop in conversion rate occurs between the {Initial Consultation} and {Diagnostic Testing} stages.

MSR.Q: Between which two consecutive stages in the funnel chart is the conversion rate drop the smallest?
MSR.A: The smallest drop in conversion rate occurs between the {Treatment Recommended} and {Treatment Initiated} stages.
